title: 2BED / 1.5BATH APARTMENT AVAILABLE ON THE DESIRABLE UPPER LEVE
description: At Arte, we have infused a luxury living experience with artistic collaborative spaces mere minutes from downtown Philadelphia. Within our walls, you will find an experience like no other. The community we have built has something to nurture the creativity in each and every one of our residents, no matter their passion. Not only do we offer a coworking space and a private conference room to collaborate with colleagues or friends, but we also offer a beautiful Makers Space, a rotating art gallery featuring work from local artists, and a fitness center to refresh, re-energize, or to simply unplug. To put it simply: Arte is a unique community that allows you to get the best, and the most, out of Philadelphia. Arte has an abundance of amenities for you to live your most convenient and creative life. Spend some time working or winding down in our lustrous lounge adorned with artwork, bike to your favorite local coffee shop, go for a swim in our pool, host your friends on the rooftop deck whatever you want to accomplish or to create, Arte is the perfect blank canvas. We are conveniently located between the Grand Central District and the Edge District, surrounded by the best that this vibrant city and Central Avenue apartments have to offer. The Central Avenue Trolley is easily accessible, and there are plenty of great biking and walkability options as well for you to grab some local food or enjoy an afternoon of shopping and entertainment Artes location cannot be beat, and we provide the ultimate living experience for those new to the city and Philadelphia natives alike.If you interested contact: Lauren26976𝐆𝐦𝐚𝐢𝐥com

title: This lovely home makes a perfect setting for living and working
description: Oh, what a view! From the moment you step inside you ll be transported by the beautiful vista from a wall of glass sliders. In summertime, look out over the lush wooded ridge. In wintertime trace the curve of Crum Creek between the snowy trees. Warm afternoon light and beautiful sunsets will be yours all year long. Soft neutral colors allow the view and your dcor to set the mood. The spacious great room encompasses a large living room and a dining space large enough for a family-sized table. (The current owner has taken advantage of the flexible dining/living space to create the cheerful reading nook you see in the photos. ) The tidy and functional kitchen has fresh flooring and counter tops as well as some newer appliances. An in-unit laundry cupboard makes wash day a breeze. The bathroom features updates including a new medicine cabinet and lighting as well as new tub/shower fixtures. Keep all your fluffy towels in the handy hall linen closet. The spacious bedroom offers another glorious wooded view as well as a full wall of closets. Move right in and enjoy all the amenities the Strath Haven has to offer. Strath Haven residents enjoy easy living in a highly sought-after community with outdoor swimming pool, library, bicycle storage, workshop, and van service. The monthly rent fee is the most comprehensive in the area, and includes ALL utilities, phone/cable/internet. Ideally located in a small college town just blocks from the beautiful campus and arboretum, town library, shops and commuter train station this lovely home makes a perfect setting for living, working and entertaining, all with a breathtaking wooded backdrop.

title: This super clean first floor unit is uniquely situated
description: Welcome to 7104 Hilltop Dr…Summit “gold star” community in Brookhaven! This super clean first floor unit is uniquely situated in a very private end location. Starting from a short walkway to the unit, you’ll find a cozy front patio & yard area at the entry. Nicely updated throughout, the open floor plan offers ample living, dining, eating, working space with convenient amenities and good natural light from large front windows. Enjoy a pleasant working kitchen with lovely white cabinetry, granite counters with good countertop space, stainless sink, recessed lighting and an open breakfast bar with pendant lighting. From the living area, you’ll find a large bedroom with a walk in closet. An updated tile bath and convenient hall laundry complete the living space. title: You will LOVE YOUR LIFE in this wide open bright and sunny unit
description: You will LOVE YOUR LIFE in this wide open bright and sunny updated 1 Bedroom Condo perched on the 11th floor with beautiful views, in the heart of one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in Philly, the Art Museum area. Best of all, this unit INCLUDES YOUR VERY OWN PRIVATE DEEDED COVERED PARKING SPOT, easily accessed from inside the building. Rarely does a 1 bedroom unit w/ its own parking spot come up for rent in this building, especially one in the most coveted spot - a corner southwest facing unit! At almost 1000’ ft, this is the largest 1 bedroom floor plan in this beautiful art deco style full service high-rise building featuring 24 hr front desk, fitness center and more. Enjoy a flexible / open LR/DR with hardwood flooring and stylishly updated kitchen with 42" white cabinetry, white tile backsplash and SS appliances. There is an in-unit WASHER/DRYER and some good storage closets. The oversized bedroom features its own large closet and there's a charming renovated full bath w/ encaustic style tile flooring and bath/shower combination. 2601 Parkway is a pet-friendly building, and the rent fees include gas, water/sewer, trash, 24-hr front desk, secured entry, resident's lounge w/ huge screen TV, fitness center, bike room, spacious lobby with seating and free wifi, on-site convenience store and restaurant, dry cleaners and FREE CENTER CITY SHUTTLE BUS. If you love the convenience and walkability of the city, but are also a nature and art lover, this place is for you. Be inspired as you step out into this beautiful and vibrant neighborhood each day: meander through Azalea Garden or Sculpture Gardens which are both just steps from your front door, take a stroll, jog or bike ride along the Schuylkill River Walk, relax in front of the Fountain of Sea Horses, or take in one of the many fabulous museums also situated just a hop skip and a jump away! Very close to Center City, the fabulous dining and shopping in Rittenhouse and Fairmount neighborhoods; close to Whole Foods and Target as well as Fairmount Park. Also conveniently located to entrance to major highways.

title: DELIGHTFUL UNIVERSITY CITY APARTMENT
description: A great opportunity to rent this truly delightful 2 bedroom 1st floor apartment in a wonderful University City location. The apartment has beautiful new hardwood floors and has just been freshly painted throughout. The apartment door open into a nice size living area with a window overlooking S 46th St. There is an attractive open adjacent kitchen. A hallway leads to the rest of the apartment with a gorgeous brand new bathroom, a medium size middle bedroom with built in closets and a large rear bedroom, also with built in closets. A rear door in the middle bedroom opens to a few steps down to a lovely peaceful large yard. Also a door from the living room takes you downstairs to a huge unfinished basement ideal for ample storage. The washer & dryer are also located here. The apartment has central gas heat and electric central air. This apartment is in a super convenient location situated property on a nice wide street and surrounded by the all local cafes and the excellent eclectic mix of restaurants and eateries. The location is perfect-just a few steps from the delightful local Clark Park and walking distance to UPENN, CHOP, HUP, ST JOSEPH’s COLLEGE, local transportation is right there and 30th St station is easily accessible. AVAILABLE LATE DECEMBER/JANUARY 1ST. $1,350 per month + utilities. Pets are welcome at the owners discretion.

The Academy House is located in the heart of Center City and within close walking distance to Rittenhouse Square, Washington Square, and the Broad Street and Market Street office corridors. The Philadelphia International Airport and Amtrak's 30th Street Station are easily accessible.

title: WELCOME TO BRIDGEVIEW! LOCATED IN BUSTLING OLD CITY!
description:
SHORT TERM 6 MONTH LEASE. Welcome to Bridgeview! Located in bustling Old City, on a quiet cobblestone street, is a renovated, top floor loft for you to call home. The building features high quality amenities including roof deck, garage parking, 24 hour concierge service, and a thriving association of owners. Your new home, unit 616, is bathed in natural light and features the high ceilings and exposed brick walls of your dreams. Enter the unit and find ample storage by the door before moving toward the kitchen, notice the hardwood floors throughout. You’ll first find an updated kitchen with a fresh new backsplash, stainless steel appliances and tons of storage. From here, you’ll enter the open living space with plenty of room for a dining table and living room set. Notice the size of these windows! You’ll find more closet storage on the way to the full bath that features stone tile and radiant heating in the floors. Next, is the large primary bedroom with two huge windows and more exposed brick. Another closet here for additional storage. Lastly you’ll find a BONUS room that is perfect for a nursery, home office, gym, dressing room, yoga room, guest bedroom or whatever you desire to make of it! Unit 616 comes with a 3x6 storage unit on the 6th floor (near the elevator and unit). GARAGE PARKING AVAILABLE FOR ADDITIONAL $250/ MO. Easy access to the Market Frankford Line, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge make this a commuter's dream and on the evenings and weekends you are in the heart of everything that Old City has to offer including tons of boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants and museums. Don’t miss your opportunity to claim this stylish home for yourself!
315 New St #616

title: WELCOME TO UNIT 15A IN THE FABULOUS ELLINGTON BUILDING!
description:
Welcome to Unit 15A in the fabulous Ellington building! Unit 15A is a light-filled, south facing corner unit in one of the more spacious layouts of the building. High up on the 15th floor, you have views of South Philadelphia as well as the iconic Comcast building! High ceilings and oversized windows make for a comfortable living & dining space. The kitchen has plenty of cabinet and counter space plus stainless steel appliances. Storage is not an issue in this unit - the hall is lined with deep closets for all of your belongings and both bedrooms have ample closet space. The primary bedroom is complete with an en-suite bathroom. Stackable washer/dryer is located right off the kitchen. The Ellington is a secure, convenient building with a 24-hour concierge, fitness center, meeting & party rooms, and a library. Several parking garages with monthly options are within a block of the front door. No pets. First, last, and security deposit due prior to move-in. $300 non-refundable move-in fee required by the building. All utilities included except cable/internet.
1500 Chestnut St #15A

title: GORGEOUS AND HUGE NEW CONSTRUCTION HOME IN THE HEART OF FISHTOWN!
description:
Absolutely GORGEOUS and HUGE new construction home in the heart of Fishtown available for rent. This property has so much space! There are living rooms on the first and 2nd floors, a fully finished basement, 4 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms and a powder room on the first floor. The kitchen has been perfectly updated with lots of cabinets and a gleaming granite island. The kitchen leads to the backyard, a private outdoor oasis with room to play and relax. This home has more windows than the average row home, and each room is filled with a lovely natural light. The location cannot be beat-- super walkable to shops, restaurants bakeries, music venues, breweries, parks, public transportation, shopping, gyms, salons, truly the best of city living at your fingertips! Pets are ok on a case-by case- basis. Easy online application-- available for immediate move-in!
1212 E Oxford St

title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom/2.5 Bath townhome
description:
As you enter the 2-story foyer you can't help but notice all the attention to detail that went into the renovations of this home! The first-floor office is ideal for working from home, the hall leads to the MAGNIFICENT KITCHEN that features New Cabinets, Granite Countertops, Backsplash, Stainless Steel Appliances, and light fixtures. The kitchen offers a pantry for plenty of storage. Adjacent to the kitchen is the Dining Room which overlooks the expansive family room for the highly desirable open floor plan concept. Enjoy relaxing on the rear deck/patio that is easily accessible through the sliding glass door.
There is a nice-sized shed for additional storage. The updated Powder Room completes the first floor. As you ascend the staircase to the second floor you will notice the large En Suite with Vaulted Ceiling and Full Bath. The second floor offers 2 additional generously sized bedrooms. Each bedroom offers a new ceiling fan and recessed lighting. The Hall Bath and large 2nd-floor laundry room complete the second floor. This home has been freshly painted and offers all-new flooring throughout.
The recessed lights throughout the home make every room pop! Each bathroom and powder room has been updated and refreshed with new fixtures, flooring, and light fixtures. A fence may be installed in the rear of the home with the approval of the association. Dog-friendly community. 2 Assigned Parking Spaces. Additional parking on the road. Within a 1/2 mile of Manderack Park and Public Transportation. There are plenty of dining, shopping, and entertainment locations nearby.

title: Beautiful, spacious, 3-story, newly built home
description: Beautiful, spacious, 3-story, newly built home.  This home shows pride of ownership, craftsmanship, and is centrally located with access to the city and suburbs. As you enter your new home you will find all levels complete with bright hardwood floors throughout. Enter through main entrance foyer to see the eye-catching, open metal. stairs going to both the upstairs and finished basement levels. Continue to walk into this cozy, yet spacious, modern home you'll find an open floor concept with a large versatile living space that beckons your design for both family room (with a gas fireplace) and dining area. A second story deck sits right off the living space area - a nice place to sit and have your morning coffee! Adjacent to this area is a fully equipped, modern kitchen with granite counter tops, breakfast nook, adorned with newer appliances. Follow the modern, metal-wrought, stairs to the second floor and you will find plenty of family closet space along with two spacious bedrooms, and two full bathrooms (one en suite). Continue up to the third floor to enter the expansive master bedroom suite complete with enormous private bathroom. The bathroom boasts marble tile, shower, and soaking tub. Have need for a kids room, or mancave? The basement is fully finished with plenty of room to create your extra living space. This home come complete with connected garage and a driveway for more off-street parking.   All this and more... is available for this, move-in ready, home that has been meticulous kept by the original owner. The home still has multiple years left on its transferable tax abatement!  Hurry now and see - it won't last!

title: Your front yard can't get better than this! Complete tree line vanta
description: Your front yard can't get better than this! Complete tree line vantage from this open floor plan deluxe one bedroom at the Rittenhouse Savoy. A spacious layout with an open kitchen, large living and dining areas plus a huge bedroom. Residence 302 has a renovated bathroom with a glass enclosed shower, 9 oversized windows overlooking the Square, plenty of storage and an in-unit washer & dryer! This unit checks the boxes that a typical one bedroom condo does not. Beautifully located at the quiet, south side of Rittenhouse Square, the Rittenhouse Savoy offers glorious park-side living in Philadelphia's most sought-after neighborhood. The handsome 1950s building welcomes visitors with a midcentury modern lobby, and residents enjoy 24-hour desk services, a spectacular sun deck with panoramic views and fitness center. Short walk to UPENN, Drexel University, Chop, Jefferson Hospital, 30th Street Station, central business district, Kimmel Center, Schuylkill River Park, high-end retail and Philadelphia's best bars, cafes, and restaurants. Gas, electric, water, heat, AC, sewer plus cable and high speed internet INCLUDED in HOA fee!

title: This Unit You Will Find a Spacious Kitchen With Granite Counters!!
description:
Upon entering this unit you will find a spacious kitchen with granite counters, and stainless appliances including brand new dishwasher and disposal. This kitchen features a large eat in area, with plenty of cabinet and counter space. Off of the kitchen is a storage area. From the kitchen you will head into the spacious and sun filled living and dining area. On your way from the kitchen there is a half bath to the left . The living room opens up to your new deck for all of your outdoor entertaining needs. Head upstairs where you will first find the main suite, featuring multiple closets and an on suite bath. Down the hall you will find the convenient second floor laundry with a brand new washing machine, and the full bath for the second and third bedrooms. The second and third bedroom are spacious and private from the main suite. This property is around the corner from 76, close to public transportation, walk-able to giant, whole foods, trader joes, Rittenhouse, and the art museum neighborhood. This location has it all, and this unit comes with a parking spot!

description:
Brand new construction available for rental. This one-of-a-kind community combines the convenience of city living and the incredible views of the Delaware River and the Ben Franklin Bridge. This is corner lot and enjoy a leisurely stroll on the walking paths along the riverfront. Located within minutes to some of the finest restaurants and hot spots of Fishtown. The interior unit that offers the perfect open concept floorplan. The 9' first and second-floor ceilings add to the appeal and grandeur of this townhome. The Primary bath includes a dual-sink vanity, seated shower, separate water closet, and leads to a large walk-in closet. Two additional bedrooms on the 3rd level can be used for a home office or guest suite. Park your car in this attached, single car, rear entry garage. Overflow street parking is also available for you and your guests. Pictures from the model home.

title: WOW, MODERN TOWNHOUSE FEATURED IN PHILADELPHIA MAGAZINE!
description:
WOW, MODERN TOWNHOUSE FEATURED IN PHILADELPHIA MAGAZINE! Here is a rare opportunity to live in a modern townhouse on a tree-lined, quiet Center City street. This beautifully maintained, eight-year-old home has an open floor plan on the first floor with a magnificent kitchen that leads to an ultra-private backyard with twinkle lights, wood decking, a chalkboard-paint wall, and a one-of-a-kind mural by local artist Kaitlin Chow. The second floor has 2 spacious bedrooms, generous closet space, and a full bath. The entire third floor is a primary suite with a custom paint treatment, 2 oversized closets including a custom closet system, and a full bath with large, glass-enclosed shower and double vanity - a rare find in Center City! Continue to the fourth floor for a roof deck offering views of the city. The finished basement has high ceilings, a laundry area, plenty of storage, and a half bath. This home is full of smart modern touches: video doorbell, dual-zone air conditioning and heating with Nest thermostats, high ceilings, wide stairs, hardwood floors, hardwired smoke detectors and sprinklers, custom blackout blinds, freshly painted walls, and more. 1309 Rodman Street is in the McCall School catchment, and a couple of blocks to Whole Foods, Acme, the Kimmel Center, Seger Park, and the hottest restaurants of Midtown Village and Rittenhouse.
1309 Rodman St
